      • getFeature

        java.lang.String getFeature(int wordId,
                            int... fields)
        Gets one or more specific features of a token

        This is an expert API

        Parameters:
        wordId - word id to get features for
        fields - array of feature ids. If this array is empty, all features are returned
        Returns:
        Array with specified features
